definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

sentences.english: He was demoted and was transferred from Taipei branch to Kaohsiung branch.
sentences.chinese: 他被降職並從臺北分公司調職到高雄分公司。

sentences.english: Be transferred from the Ministry of Commerce Ambassador demoted?
sentences.chinese: 調離商務部駐華大使算是降職？

sentences.english: Promotions and demotions were zealously monitored.
sentences.chinese: 受瘋狂監視的升職和降職。

sentences.english: He was put down from the office for peculation.
sentences.chinese: 他因侵吞公款而被降職。

sentences.english: The head nurse was reduced to ordinary nurse due to malpractice.
sentences.chinese: 這位護士長由於玩忽職守被降職爲普通護士。

sentences.english: Wadsworth group described the degraded regeneration of entanglement and renewable.
sentences.chinese: 再生巨流描述被降職的男人的糾葛和再生。

sentences.english: She says she was demoted and then sacked after complaining to the Commission.
sentences.chinese: 她向平機會投訴後，被降職，然後被解僱。

definition: to relieve sb of his post/to sack/to demote/dismissal/sacking
to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office
to be transferred to another post/to post away
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
